examples: The judge pronounced banishment upon the war criminal.

entries.meaning: The state of being banished, exile.
examples: You are in error. / This is terror. / This is your banishment. This land is mine. / This is what you earn. / This is the Law of No Return. / This is the sour dough, this the sweet wine. / This is my history, this my race / And this unhappy man threw acid in my face.
